bibl.title: Ammianus Marcellinus Res Gestae 17.4.17 and the Translator of the Obelisk in Rome's Circus Maximus.
bibl.note: Proposes to emend in Circo Hermapionis to in Circo Maximo Apionis in Ammianus' text. Apion was a prominent Alexandrian scholar of the first half of the first century CE (remembered especially as the target of Josephus' Contra Apionem).
bibl.seg: Amin Benaissa, Ammianus Marcellinus Res Gestae 17.4.17 and the Translator of the Obelisk in Rome's Circus Maximus.

Proposes to emend in Circo Hermapionis to in Circo Maximo Apionis in Ammianus' text. Apion was a prominent Alexandrian scholar of the first half of the first century CE (remembered especially as the target of Josephus' Contra Apionem).
